sen.j: 三貴子（みはしらのうずのみこ）とは記紀神話で黄泉の国から帰ってきたイザナギが黄泉の汚れを落としたときに最後に生まれ落ちた三柱の神々のことである。
sen.e: Mihashira no Uzuno Miko refers to three deities that came into the world lastly when Izanagi came back from Yominokuni (Hades) and cleansed dirtiness from the Yomi (world after death), according to the Kiki-shinwa (the Kojiki, Nihonshoki and mythology).

Mihashira no Uzuno Miko refers to final three deities that came into the world when Izanagi came back from Yominokuni (Hades) and cleansed dirtiness from the Yomi (world after death), according to the Kiki-shinwa (the Kojiki, Nihonshoki and mythology).

Mihashira no Uzuno Miko refers to final three deities that came into the world when Izanagi came back from Yominokuni (Hades) and cleansed dirtiness from the Yomi (world after death), according to the Kiki-shinwa (the Kojiki, Nihonshoki and mythology).

sen.j: 三貴神（さんきし・さんきしん）とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It is also called Sankishi or Sankishin.
It is also called Sankishi or Sankishin.
It is also called Sankishi or Sankishin.

sen.j: - イザナギの左目から生まれたとされる女神。
sen.e: - A goddess born from the left eye of Izanagi.
- A goddess born from the left eye of Izanagi.
- A goddess born from the left eye of Izanagi.

sen.j: - イザナギの右目から生まれたとされる男神（女神とする説もある）。
sen.e: - A god born from the right eye of Izanagi (Some say it is a goddess).
- A god born from the right eye of Izanagi (Some say it is a goddess).
- A god born from the right eye of Izanagi (Some say it is a goddess).

sen.j: - イザナギの鼻から生まれたとされる男神。
sen.e: - A god born from the nose of Izanagi.
- A god born from the nose of Izanagi.
- A god born from the nose of Izanagi.
